span.a: You are currently on this page - Available Meals for Children

span.span: Meals Available For Children During School Closure

span.br: When you arrive at MHS to pick-up meals, please pop your trunk.

li.span: Meals will be placed in your trunk from now on.
TheÂ pick up days areÂ Mondays and Thursdays.Â
Pick up isÂ at MHS from 11:30-12:30.
On Mondays, you will receive 3 lunches and 3 breakfasts for each child.
On Thursdays, you will receive 2 lunches and 2 breakfasts for each child.

p.span: In order to accommodate this change, the sandwichÂ in all lunches will now be PBJ Uncrustables.Â PBJ Uncrustables should be kept frozen until about 1 hour before your child is ready to eat them.Â The quality of the sandwichÂ drops if they are left out of the freezer for more than 1 day.Â
Please fill out the food serviceÂ surveyÂ so we know how many to prepare.
Call or email with questions.Â Â
